post.title: June DSL CTP
post.content: Congrats to the team for their latest version of the DSL Toolkit, integrated into the June CTP of the VS SDK. According to the published product plans of the VS SDK, they’re suppoesd to ship their next release – including the final DSL toolkit – next month. Looking forward to it.
post.excerpt: Congrats to the team for their latest version of the DSL Toolkit, integrated into the June CTP of the VS SDK. According to the published product plans of the VS SDK, they’re suppoesd to ship their next release – including the final DSL toolkit – next month. Looking forward to it.
